His complaint was aggravated by the exertion, and he arrived in a state of great exhaustion, from which he never re- covered. He survived only a few dayS, and died at Rome, on the 23d of June, 1854. His untimely death is deplored by the antiquaries and scholars of Scotland, and not by them only. If there be any-
